notes: Malaria Zero / CDC / MSPP) conducted a census of all households in Moron, Chambellan, Dame Marie and Anse d'Hainault the week before the storm. Household counts were aggregated by scan grids and the entire area was captured except for the southernmost tip of Moron. Shape file attached. Average # of individuals per household ranged from 5 in urban centers to 7 in rural areas. Please share for response efforts with attribution.
